issue.title: [C++] Support checking the equality of the different contiguous tensors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5813](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5813). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current TensorEquals function couldn't check the equality of the different contiguous tensors.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5813?focusedCommentId=16877676) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4774
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4774>
